channel.title: Help
channel.description: hello i have problem.... can any 1 tell me what is that ????? ( Unable to fetch guest information. The table 'users' must contain an entry with id = 1 that represents anonymous users ) when opening localhost in empty mozilla window when opening 127.0.0.1 and my IP so i get this one ( Unable to fetch guest information. The table 'users' must contain an entry with id = 1 that represents anonymous users ) can any 1 tell me what i must to do ?

item.title: Help
item.dc:creator: @snoopy89 snoopy89
item.description:
@snoopy89 wrote:

The test Account is the temple for creating new users the Id of this acccount has to be one!

Read full topic

item.title: Help
item.dc:creator: @bengina bengina
item.description:
@bengina wrote:

log into your database, scroll down to the bottom and click on users… Select browse at the top of the screen… you will see a user with the name administrator click the pensil icon on the left of the name and then change the id to 1 and click go at the bottom.

hope that helps

Read full topic
